titleStmt.title: The batchellors fore-cast, or, Cupid unblest being an answer to Cupids trappan or up the Green Forrest Though many zelots do in love seem holy yet be accounts it all to be but folly. To the tune of Cupids trappan.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, by P.L. for R. Burton at the Horse-shoe in West-smith-field,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and date from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Verse - "Once did I love and a very pretty girl,".
Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University.
